name: Last Chance (LanguageMaster2022)
description:
This game was made using game assets provided on a Coursera course called "Game Design and Development 1" (Michigan State University).

Major modifications I have done are as follows:

  • reworked the UI to fit the story and flow of the scenes/levels
  • created a story to link the levels
  • changed the enemy size and health to make some bosses (not a major change though as I had trouble reskinning the enemies).

Created by Mathew Armstrong
